refnamediv.refpurpose: Inverse Discrete Cosine Transform of a sample array (type-III DCT)

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Applies an Inverse Discrete Cosine Transform to an input 1-dimensional array producing an array of the same size containing the transform. Currently only power-of-two sizes are implemented. Available in i-time or perf (k-rate) versions.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iout[] -- output array containing the IDCT. It will be created if it does not exist.
iin[] -- input array containing the input

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the IDCT. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the input
